name: HairKebab
description:
This game was made in 48h during the Global Gam Jam 2023.
We made it for Comedic Purposes only, we have no desire to create controversies, we only wish to laugh with the players.

This game is a Hairdresser Simulator set in Turkey where all your clients are bald.

Have fun !

  • DUSSERT Romain
